what: A R Markdown thesis template for Wageningen University
title: A R Markdown thesis template for Wageningen University
text: Wagedown aims provide Rmarkdown template PhD candidate Wageningen University, Netherlands. project inspired bookdown package thesisdown. Currently, PDF gitbook versions fully-functional. new working bookdown/rmarkdown, please read documentation available gitbook template https://ismayc.github.io/thesisdown_book.
